name: study-planner-app
description: A comprehensive study planner with PDF reading time tracking

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.start: npm run build && concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run install:all
